remarks: An atom equals the intersection of two majorizing lines.  (Contributed by NM, 3-Apr-2013.)
statement:
2llnmeqat.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
2llnmeqat.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
2llnmeqat.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
2llnmeqat.n $e |- N = ( LLines ` K ) $.
2llnmeqat $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( X e. N /\ Y e. N /\ P e. A ) /\ ( X =/= Y /\ P .<_ ( X ./\ Y ) ) ) -> P = ( X ./\ Y ) ) $.
